Course.Name: Computer Science I HON
Course.Description: An introduction to computer science and computer programming is given, in which the fundamentals of a high-level programming language will be introduced. Methods of problem solving, techniques of algorithmic development and concepts of structured object-oriented programming will be emphasized.

Prerequisite.item: Concurrent enrollment or credit for MATH 1314 or higher level mathematics course.

Course.Course-attributes: Degree Elective, CS Instruction Fee - LU
